This is a dummy cookiecutter vairable that I use to give some description to the next cookiecutter variable...

 The next cookiecutter variable is called 'submodules'. Here you can specify snakemake submodules as a dictionary with name of submodule (only word characters allowed, [A-za-z0-9_]) and url of remote repo

example: {"rna_seq": {"url": "git@github.com:bfairkun/snakemake-workflow_rna-seq.git", "branch": "main"}, "another_git_submodule": {"url": "https://github.com/user/mod.git"}} 

Leave blank (default) or supply and empty dict to not add any submodules

Ready to define submodules? Press enter to continue.
